build

-- go.mod --
module example

-- module.cue --
package quickbooks

import (
	"discern.com/devx"
)

Types: devx.#TypeMap & {
	PullDataRequest: {
		Fields: {
			ID: Type: "string"
		}
	}

	PullDataResponse: {
		Fields: {
			Data: Type: "string"
		}
	}
}

Worker: devx.#Worker & {
	TaskQueue: "default"

	Workflows: {
		PullData: {
			Request:  Types.PullDataRequest
			Response: Types.PullDataResponse
		}
	}

	Activities: {
		PullAccountData: {
			Request:  Types.PullDataRequest
			Response: Types.PullDataResponse
		}
	}
}
